channel.title: London on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in London on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: David Mackenzie and Aaron Taylor-Johnson on How ‘Fuze’ Is “Unrepentantly” Entertaining
item.description: The Scottish filmmaker and his star are ready to detonate their explosive new feature about a World War II bomb uncovered in central London: “It’s a bank robbery film sung by the Ramones.”

item.title: David Mackenzie and Aaron Taylor-Johnson on How ‘Fuze’ Is “Unrepentantly” Entertaining
item.description: The Scottish filmmaker and his star are ready to detonate their explosive new feature about a World War II bomb uncovered in central London: “It’s a bank robbery film sung by the Ramones.”
